participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, enjoys helping others and has a strong affinity for nature.
participant_1.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and playful, loves sports and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: i hate math class. my brother is older than me. i am on the soccer team. i am 13 years old.

content.text: I am good. Just got off work at the gas station.
Yes. I work at the gas station as a cashier.
Are you a girl or boy
I am a boy. I just turned 10 yesterday.
